result.original_title: The South Bank Show: Roman Polanski
result.title: The South Bank Show: Roman Polanski
result.overview: A documentary first presented on the South Bank Show in 1980 about the career of film director Roman Polanski.

result.title: Karl Hess: Toward Liberty
result.overview: A look at Karl Hess, libertarian intellectual and activist, from his background as a magazine editor in his youth to his work as a Republican speechwriter, as he became simultaneously a writer for Barry Goldwater and a member of Students for a Democratic Society. In the late 1960s he embarked on a new period in his life, moving to rural West Virginia and becoming involved in movements promoting alternative technologies and renewable energy. He discusses his views opposing large institutions, ranging from government to corporations to universities.

result.original_title: Vizsgálat Martinovics Ignác szászvári apát és társai ügyében
result.title: The Trial of Martinovics and the Hungarian Jacobins
result.overview: For this austere, clear and sharp telefeature, Judit Elek focused on the last months of Martinovics’ life: his interrogation by the Austrians, the examining Magistrate Schilling in particular, shown as a battle of wits as well as delusions – on both sides. Elek had wanted to make this film in the early 1970s, but wasn’t allowed to. When she finally got the chance, the reactions were predictable, as the parallels with recent Hungarian history were simply too obvious for officialdom not to feel anxious. History may not repeat itself, but the variations look eerily similar...

result.title: In Search of the Japanese
result.overview: A fictional comedy about Australian and Japanese culture clash.

result.title: France/Tour/Detour/Deux/Enfants
result.overview: In this astonishing twelve-part project for and about television — the title of which refers to a 19th-century French primer Le tour de la France par deux enfants — Godard and Miéville take a detour through the everyday lives of two children in contemporary France.

result.original_title: Star Wars: Music by John Williams
result.title: Star Wars: Music by John Williams
result.overview: Documentário da BBC. Testemunhe John Williams compondo a lendária trilha sonora de O Império Contra-Ataca e regendo a Orquestra Sinfônica de Londres.
